ch0111_40_wataru/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Nice to see you here.
ch0111_40_wataru/0101_0701_02_10:
It’s the start of a new day! Be sure to live it with
no regrets!
ch0111_40_wataru/7101_0701_01_10: I think the start of something is always nice.
ch0111_40_wataru/7101_0701_02_10:
A new year, a new day...and new Pokémon
battles! I’m so grateful that I can experience
all these new things!
ch0111_40_wataru/7102_0701_01_10:
How do you like my outfit today? It really captures
the power of Gyarados, doesn’t it?
ch0111_40_wataru/7102_0701_02_10:
I also like it because, as a traditional outfit, it’s
a reminder of the ancient customs that have been
passed down through time!
ch0111_40_wataru/7103_0701_01_10:
This outfit shows off Gyarados’s power as
a dragon!
ch0111_40_wataru/7103_0701_02_10:
What’s that, you say? Gyarados isn’t a
Dragon-type Pokémon?
ch0111_40_wataru/7103_0701_03_10: Haha, not all dragons are Dragon-type Pokémon!
ch0111_40_wataru/7104_0701_01_10:
Whenever I see Gyarados, I remember the Lake
of Rage in Johto.
ch0111_40_wataru/7104_0701_02_10:
There was once a red Gyarados raging and
thrashing about there that had been forced to 
evolve by Team Rocket’s radio waves.
ch0111_40_wataru/7104_0701_03_10:
Back then, a really reliable kid about your age
helped me sort things out.
ch0111_40_wataru/7105_0701_02_10: That teamwork you showed was impressive!
ch0111_40_wataru/7105_0701_03_10:
But always remember to stay humble! Whenever a
new day starts, remember that!
ch0111_40_wataru/1701_0701_01_10:
I’ve been waiting for you! I have something to
give you!
ch0111_40_wataru/1701_0702_01_10:
You can use it when you’re in trouble. It should
help you out!
ch0111_40_wataru/2501_0701_01_10:
This outfit is great, but as a dragon master, I
want a cape to go with it.
ch0111_40_wataru/2501_0701_02_10:
I wonder what kind of print and material would
go well with this outfit. Do you have any ideas?
ch0111_40_wataru/2501_0702_01_10:
I asked my cousin Clair if she had any good
ideas as to where I could find a cape to match
this outfit.
ch0111_40_wataru/2501_0702_02_10:
She said that capes are important...but also that
traditional wear has its own unique charm, too!
ch0111_40_wataru/2501_0702_03_10:
However, I personally prefer wearing a cape.
I just can’t do without one.
ch0111_40_wataru/2511_0701_01_10: Do you go back to your hometown sometimes?
ch0111_40_wataru/2511_0701_02_10:
I’m sure there are people there waiting for
you to visit—and you might have some
nostalgic reunions!
ch0111_40_wataru/2511_0702_01_10: My hometown is Blackthorn City, in Johto.
ch0111_40_wataru/2511_0702_02_10:
It’s surrounded by mountains and can only be
reached via a treacherous path...
ch0111_40_wataru/2511_0702_03_10:
But that probably wouldn’t be much of a problem
for someone like you!
ch0111_40_wataru/3001_0701_01_10:
Pleasant morning we’re having today!
The Pokémon are all bright and cheerful.
ch0111_40_wataru/3003_0701_01_10:
Don’t let your energy crash in the afternoon.
Wake up! Keep moving!
ch0111_40_wataru/3005_0701_01_10:
Make sure you get a good rest tonight.
We could use that energy tomorrow!
